Boasting street frontage, a private courtyard and two car spaces, this spotless and spacious two bedroom residence is set to impress! Superbly situated within Clayton South, you will find your new abode conveniently walking distance to Westall Train Station, Keeley Park, Westall Primary School, Westall Secondary College and bus transport as well as only minutes to major amenities such as Clayton Shopping Plaza, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Springvale Homemaker Centre, the Princes Highway and Monash Freeway.
Inside the home, clean, crisp interiors and gorgeous timber floorboards flow throughout. An open plan living and dining space wraps around into a galley style kitchen with classic white cabinetry, modern mirror splashback, gas cooking appliances and convenient laundry access. The two robed bedrooms share a central bathroom with separate WC whilst a wall heater and reverse cycle air conditioner provide heating and cooling options.
Adding yet more great value to this easy care package is a private courtyard with patio and pergola area, perfect for barbeques and outdoor dining, as well as a sunny garden area with adjoining storage shed and a single carport plus second off street car space.
Appealing to a wide range of future residents, including couples, downsizers, students and tenants, this ready to move straight in property is a wise investment not to be missed!

Description:
SUBLIME FAMILY HOME TWO MINUTES FROM CLAYTON SHOPPING DISTRICT
Playing host to two separate living areas, bedrooms of a generous nature and an excellent timber kitchen that instantly delights, this welcoming four-bedroom, single-level home offers the perfect start to family life. Add to the mix a stellar location that's less than 5 minutes away from Clayton Shopping Centre, Clayton Train Station, schools, Monash University Clayton Campus, the Monash Freeway, transport.
For your comfort, bedrooms are spacious and zoned for privacy, away from the main living areas that are bathed in natural light.
Currently carpeted throughout but holds treasured timber floorboards underneath and wonderful high ceilings enhance the appeal of the light and bright interior.
That essence of space extends to the large garage on the left and double carport on the other, while an abundance of storage space in and around the home promotes clutter-free living. Air conditioning and ducted heating ensure your kept cool in summer and warm in winter.
This home has been loved and cared for since the time the first brick was laid and the owner's would love to see it passed on to another family to enjoy it as much as they did.
